alert.note: Alert for Northern Wayne; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 9:57PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Susquehanna and northwestern Wayne Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 957 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thompson, or 14 miles east of Montrose, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Susquehanna, Susquehanna Depot, Ararat, Lanesboro, Thompson, Union Dale, Starrucca, Shehawken and Starruca. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
